entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.5°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning early this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this morning then to 90 gusting to 110 near noon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
